title: SL due to receive medicine & medical equipment from India
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Minister of Health Prof. Channa Jayasumana says that 101 types of drugs and surgical equipment donated by the Government of India will reach the island next Wednesday (27).
The drugs and surgical equipment will reach Sri Lanka via a vessel belonging to Indian Navy.
Meanwhile, Sri Lanka is also due to receive a donation of Rs. 340 million worth of essential medicines from the Indonesian Government within a week, he added.
